msgSnippet: ... Don Quixada No i am sorry, a kvm has no reflection mechanism, j2meUnit is a version of JUnit with no reflection. JUnit wont run on a kvm. regards roland

>So... it seems that there is really no need for J2ME Unit if one can
>test using JUnit and the KVM.

>Do you think that will work?
Don Quixada
No i am sorry,

a kvm has no reflection mechanism, j2meUnit is a version of JUnit with no
reflection. JUnit wont run on a kvm.

regards
roland
